title.rendered: Migrating Your File Server to the Cloud

content.rendered:
Migrating Your File Server to the Cloud Best Practices for Cloud Based File Collaboration

 
With the rise of mobility and remote work, users need to share files from anywhere and from any kind of device. However, many companies have yet to modernize their file server and migrate their files to the cloud. During this webinar, the experts at Snap Tech IT will explore the benefits of a cloud-file sharing approach. With cloud-file sharing, collaboration becomes convenient, mobile-friendly, and secure. This webinar we will cover: · Challenges of traditional file servers, including user frustration with VPNs and remote access · Common file-sharing challenges, including large files, mobile access, and sharing on the go · Benefits of a cloud only approach to file-collaboration · Best practices for migrating your file server to the cloud If you’d like to continue the conversation on migrating your file server to the cloud, or have questions about strengthening your IT infrastructure, contact us to learn more.

You can also find additional educational material on our Resource Center.
